subject: svn commit: samba-docs r1121 - in trunk/smbdotconf/winbind: .
body:
Author: kseeger
Date: 2007-06-06 13:19:10 +0000 (Wed, 06 Jun 2007)
New Revision: 1121

WebSVN: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba-docs&rev=1121

Log:
winbin:rpc only is no longer a parametric option -> update documentation
Modified:
   trunk/smbdotconf/winbind/winbindrpconly.xml


Changeset:
Modified: trunk/smbdotconf/winbind/winbindrpconly.xml
===================================================================
--- trunk/smbdotconf/winbind/winbindrpconly.xml	2007-06-04 10:40:47 UTC (rev 1120)
+++ trunk/smbdotconf/winbind/winbindrpconly.xml	2007-06-06 13:19:10 UTC (rev 1121)
@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-<samba:parameter name="winbind:rpc only"
+<samba:parameter name="winbind rpc only"
 	context="G"
 	type="string"
 		 advanced="1" developer="0"
